title: CRAFTING TIMEOUT
body: i tried to reroll 3 skin shard and it didnt work now my 3 skin shard are gone and i didnt get any skin from the reroll !!!!!!!

replies.body:
Hey there,

If, after restarting your client you still have items missing from your hextech loot, I recommend [contacting Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) for further assistance.
